main event: A civilian woman observed an object shaped like a hat box with an inverted saucer on top while waiting for traffic lights in East Moline, Illinois on 11 October 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as having port holes around the side,it appeared to remain in the same general area before suddenly accelerating out of sight,witnesses noted the object was silent and did not resemble any known aircraft, some witnesses were airport personnel and deemed reliable, the object was in sight for approximately 5-10 minutes.
sighted object: an object shaped like a hat box with an inverted saucer on top
